_addNewComparator(bool,address).details: Adds a new comparator to the platform

params.comparatorAddress: Address of the contract where the comparator is implemented
params.isDefault: Whether the added comparator is a default indicator

_addNewIndicator(bool,address).details: Adds a new indicator to the platform

params.indicatorAddress: Address of the contract where the indicator is implemented
params.isDefault: Whether the added indicator is a default indicator

params.comparatorAddress: Address of the comparator to purchase

params.indicatorAddress: Address of the indicator to purchase

checkIfUserPurchasedComparator(address,u.details: Checks whether the user purchased the given comparator

params.comparatorIndex: Index of the comparator in the comparators array

returns._0: bool Whether the user purchased the given comparator

checkIfUserPurchasedIndicator(address,ui.details: Checks whether the user purchased the given indicator

params.indicatorIndex: Index of the indicator in the indicators array

returns._0: bool Whether the user purchased the given indicator

getComparatorFromIndex(bool,uint256).details: Returns the address of the comparator

params.index: Index of the comparator in array of available comparator
params.isDefault: Whether the comparator is a default comparator

getComparators().details: Returns the address of each custom comparator

returns._0: address[] The addresses of available custom comparator

getDefaultComparators().details: Returns the address of each default comparator

returns._0: address[] The addresses of available default comparator

getDefaultIndicators().details: Returns the address of each default indicator

returns._0: address[] The addresses of available default indicators

getIndicatorFromIndex(bool,uint256).details: Returns the address of the indicator

params.index: Index of the indicator in array of available indicators
params.isDefault: Whether the indicator is a default indicator

getIndicators().details: Returns the address of each custom indicator

returns._0: address[] The addresses of available custom indicators

getUserPurchasedComparators(address).details: Returns index of each comparator the user purchased

returns._0: uint[] The index in comparators array of each comparator the user purchased

getUserPurchasedIndicators(address).details: Returns index of each indicator the user purchased

returns._0: uint[] The index in indicators array of each indicator the user purchased
true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
